OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" SimulationMode="OnDemand" Text="Recordsets get given their index (the number between the brackets like [[rec(23).set]] is index 23) when they are created.
If you delete Index 1, all the other indexes remain the same.
Counting records will not count deleted records. So you may have an Index 531 present and only 1 record count because you deleted all the other records."
